pageTitle: Bradford School Holidays and Term Dates 2014-2015-2016
textBeforeTable: Please check with your school before making any holiday arrangements. Term Time (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Some schools have additional holidays - the data below should be used as a guide. Always check with your child's school before booking a holiday. Term and Holiday Dates for 2014-2015-2016 are taken from data sourced from City of Bradford Metropolitan District Council. We take every care to ensure our holiday data is accurate, but please always check with your children's schools before booking any holidays!
